original_text: To each and all of them he gave a change of clothes, but to Benjamin he gave three hundred shekels of silver and five changes of clothes.
korean_text: 또 그들에게 다 각기 옷 한 벌씩을 주되 베냐민에게는 은 삼백과 옷 다섯 벌을 주고

sentences.original_text: To each and all of them he gave a change of clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 각자와 모두에게 옷 한 벌을 주었고

sentences.original_text: but to Benjamin he gave three hundred shekels of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 베냐민에게는 삼백 세겔의 은을 주었고
